mentors.name: Abigail Mills
mentors.about: I graduated from Harvard University and my dream since I was a little girl was to be a Computer Systems Analyst.

mentors.name: Mateo Little
mentors.about: I graduated from Claremont McKenna and became a financial adviser at age 35.

mentors.name: Elliott Bernal
mentors.about: I graduated from New York University and became an Insurance Agent when I was 25.

mentors.name: Kiefer Barron
mentors.about: I graduated from Dartmouth University and created the startup company iPhysical when I was 35.

mentors.name: Heather Morse
mentors.about: I graduated from Yale University and won Master Chef in 2010. I now own my own restaurant, Flavorati.
